        public org.altbeacon.beacon.BeaconDataNotifier getDataNotifier()

      • setDataNotifier

        public void setDataNotifier(org.altbeacon.beacon.BeaconDataNotifier notifier)
        This notifier is a variant of the RangingNotifier. If ranging has been started and this notifier is set, then for each ranged beacon detected, beacon data will be fetched from the cloud. When the data are available, the notifier will be called. This notifier is very similar to the RangeNotifier except that when called, beacon data will be available. Note that because a server call is necessary to fetch this data (if it has not already been received), the DataNotifier callback may come a few seconds after the beacon is detected, depending on network response times.
        Parameters:
        notifier -
